tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE imaging_results (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    image_data BYTES,
    robot_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE imaging_results (
    patient_id INT,
    image_id INT,
    image_data BYTEA,
    result TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_robots (
    robot_id INT,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50),
    robot_model VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_robots (
    robot_id UUID,
    robot_name VARCHAR(255),
    robot_type VARCHAR(100),
    manufacturer_name VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_activity_logs (
    log_id UUID,
    robot_id UUID,
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    activity_description VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (log_id)
);
